description: Dive into the complex legal landscape of Non-Fungible Tokens (NFTs) and digital ownership. Explore key issues such as intellectual property rights, smart contracts, jurisdictional challenges, consumer protection, and the environmental and ethical considerations of NFTs. Understand the evolving legal frameworks and future directions shaping NFTs beyond art to real estate and gaming.
keywords: NFTs, digital ownership, legal challenges, intellectual property, smart contracts, jurisdictional issues, consumer protection, environmental impact, ethical considerations, blockchain, regulatory frameworks
title: Exploring the Legal Landscape of NFTs and Digital Ownership
